items.short_desc: The 34-year-old had sustained a split webbing between his right thumb and index finger that required four stitches in the ODI series opener.
items.asset_title: Eoin Morgan ruled out of India ODIs, Jos Buttler named captain

items.short_desc: Ace Indian batsman KL Rahul revealed that less game time bothered him but he had full belief in his preparations.
items.asset_title: IND vs ENG ODI: Lack of game time played on my mind, says KL Rahul

items.short_desc: From pre-Independence tales to stories from the 2011 ICC World Cup, Indian filmmakers have not missed the opportunity to make cricket movies. Here’s the complete list.
items.asset_title: Indian cricket movies: Get bowled over by these Bollywood films

items.short_desc: With Shreyas Iyer injured, Suryakumar Yadav and Rishabh Pant could play for India. Watch India vs England 2nd ODI on live streaming, get telecast details and schedule.
items.asset_title: Suryakumar Yadav’s ODI debut likely as India look to seal ODI series vs England - watch live

items.short_desc: SportsAdda's brand ambassador Brett Lee picks four players who he thinks could be the standout performers in the second India-England ODI in Pune.
